title: switch
content:
# switch

2022-07-04 03:44

Switch.

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Type** | **Description** |
| name | String | Component name, used for form submission to get data. |
| checked | Boolean | Checked or not. |
| disabled | Boolean | Disable or not. |
| color | String | Component color. |
| onChange | EventHandle | Trigger on checked change, event.detail={ value:checked}. |
| color | Color | Switch color. |

### Screenshot

![image](https://ac.alipay.com/storage/2020/5/11/793a3d8d-5270-405b-9362-e6a670b9c842.png)

### Sample Code

copy

```html
<view class="page">
  <view class="switch-list">
    <view class="switch-item">
      <switch checked onChange="switchChange"/>
    </view>
  </view>
</view>
```

copy

```javascript
Page({
  switchChange (e){
    console.log('switchChange event, value:', e.detail.value)
  },
})
```
